data.name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini-Album Track 15 - Street Fighter Alpha 3 - Who'll Be Your Double? (Character Select)
data.detailed_description:
Select your character, your fighting style, and your speed, but not before getting pumped up with the character select theme from Street Fighter Alpha 3!

Don't miss out on this classic!
